001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model;
002
003import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
004import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
005import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
006import com.google.gson.annotations.Expose;
007import com.google.gson.annotations.SerializedName;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.Collections;
010import java.util.Date;
011import java.util.LinkedList;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Objects;
014import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
015
016/**
017 * Represents a single passphrase, consisting of a name, a persistence key, and a list of words.
018 */
019public final class Passphrase {
020
021  private static final String MUTATION_REQUIRED_MESSAGE = "After word list is created, length can "
022      + "only be set via append(String), insert(String), insert(int, String), remove(int), "
023      + "remove(String), clear(), or truncate(int).";
024  private static final String NULL_LIST_ERROR_FORMAT = "Unable to access element at position %d in "
025      + "passphrase of length 0.";
026  private static final String TO_STRING_FORMAT = "%1$s[key=%2$s, name=%3$s, words=%4$s, length=%5$d]";
027
028  @Expose(deserialize = true, serialize = false)
029  @SerializedName(value = "id", alternate = {"key"})
030  private final String key = null;
031
032  @Expose(deserialize = true, serialize = false)
033  private final Date created = null;
034
035  @Expose(deserialize = true, serialize = false)
036  private final Date modified = null;
037
038  @Expose
039  private String name;
040
041  @Expose
042  private List<String> words;
043
044  @Expose(deserialize = false, serialize = true)
045  private int length;
046
047  /**
048   * Appends specified {@code word} to the end of the list of words in this passphrase. Since this
049   * method mutates the list of words in the passphrase, a list will be created first (if it doesn't
050   * already exist).
051   *
052   * @param word {@link String} to append to passphrase.
053   * @return {@code true} if {@code word} was successfully added, {@code false} otherwise.
054   */
055  public boolean append(String word) {
056    ensureWordsExists();
057    return words.add(word);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Inserts specified {@code word} at the start of this passphrase. Since this method mutates the
062   * list of words in the passphrase, a list will be created first (if it doesn't already exist).
063   *
064   * @param word {@link String} to insert in passphrase.
065   * @return {@code true} if {@code word} was successfully inserted, {@code false} otherwise.
066   */
067  public boolean insert(String word) {
068    return insert(0, word);
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Inserts specified {@code word} at index {@code position} in this passphrase.
073   *
074   * @param position index at which {@code word} is inserted in passphrase.
075   * @param word     {@link String} to insert in passphrase.
076   * @return {@code true} if {@code word} was successfully inserted, {@code false} otherwise.
077   * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if {@code position} is negative or greater than passphrase
078   *                                   length.
079   */
080  public boolean insert(int position, String word) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {
081    ensureWordsExists();
082    words.add(position, word);
083    return true;
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Removes word at specified {@code position} from this passphrase.
088   *
089   * @param position index from which to remove word from passphrase.
090   * @return {@link String} word removed.
091   * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if {@code position} is negative or greater than or equal to
092   *                                   passphrase length.
093   */
094  public String remove(int position) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {
095    ensureWordsExists();
096    return words.remove(position);
097  }
098
099  /**
100   * Removes the first occurrence (if any) of specified {@code word} from this passphrase.
101   *
102   * @param word {@link String} to be removed from passphrase.
103   * @return {@code true} if {@code word} was found and removed, {@code false} otherwise.
104   */
105  public boolean remove(String word) {
106    ensureWordsExists();
107    return words.remove(word);
108  }
109
110  /**
111   * Removes all words from this passphrase.
112   */
113  public void clear() {
114    ensureWordsExists();
115    words.clear();
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Truncates list to specified {@code length}.
120   *
121   * @param length Size of truncated list.
122   * @return {@code true} if list was successfully truncated, {@code false} otherwise.
123   * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if {@code position} is negative or greater than or equal to
124   *                                   passphrase length.
125   */
126  public boolean truncate(int length) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {
127    ensureWordsExists();
128    words.subList(length, words.size()).clear();
129    return true;
130  }
131
132  /**
133   * Gets (retrieves) the word at the specified position in this passphrase.
134   * @param position {@code int} index of word to retrieve.
135   * @return {@link String} retrieved word.
136   * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if {@code position} is negative or greater than or equal to
137   *                                   passphrase length.
138   */
139  public String get(int position) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {
140    if (words == null) {
141      throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException(String.format(NULL_LIST_ERROR_FORMAT, position));
142    }
143    return words.get(position);
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Sets (replaces) the word at the specified position in this passphrase.
148   *
149   * @param position {@code int} index of word to replace.
150   * @param word {@link String} new word to put at specified {@code position}.
151   * @return {@link String} previous word at {@code position}.
152   * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if {@code position} is negative or greater than or equal to
153   *                                   passphrase length.
154   */
155  public String set(int position, String word) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException {
156    ensureWordsExists();
157    return words.set(position, word);
158  }
159
160  @Override
161  public int hashCode() {
162    return (words == null) ? Objects.hash(key, name, length) : Objects.hash(key, name, words);
163  }
164
165  @Override
166  public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj) {
167    boolean equivalent;
168    if (obj == this) {
169      equivalent = true;
170    } else if (obj instanceof Passphrase other) {
171      //noinspection ConstantValue
172      equivalent = Objects.equals(key, other.key) && Objects.equals(name, other.name)
173          && (words != null && words.equals(other.words)
174          || words == null && other.words == null && length == other.length);
175    } else {
176      equivalent = false;
177    }
178    return equivalent;
179  }
180
181  @SuppressLint("DefaultLocale")
182  @NonNull
183  @Override
184  public String toString() {
185    //noinspection ConstantValue
186    return String.format(
187        TO_STRING_FORMAT, getClass().getSimpleName(), key, name, words, getLength());
188  }
189
190  public String getKey() {
191    return key;
192  }
193
194  public Date getCreated() {
195    return created;
196  }
197
198  public Date getModified() {
199    return modified;
200  }
201
202  public String getName() {
203    return name;
204  }
205
206  public void setName(String name) {
207    this.name = name;
208  }
209
210  public List<String> getWords() {
211    return (words == null) ? List.of() : Collections.unmodifiableList(words);
212  }
213
214  public int getLength() {
215    return (words == null) ? length : words.size();
216  }
217
218  public void setLength(int length) {
219    if (words != null) {
220      throw new IllegalStateException(MUTATION_REQUIRED_MESSAGE);
221    }
222    this.length = length;
223  }
224
225  private void ensureWordsExists() {
226    if (words == null) {
227      words = new ArrayList<>();
228    }
229  }
230
231}
